bilingual.target: 通信工程帮助我们实现了全球通信。

bilingual.source: Satellite communication is crucial for communication in remote areas.
bilingual.target: 卫星通信对于远程地区的通信非常重要。

bilingual.source: Laser communication has great potential in satellite communication.
bilingual.target: 激光通信在卫星通信中有很大的应用潜力。

bilingual.source: Satcom is essential for remote area communication.
bilingual.target: 卫星通信对于偏远地区的通信至关重要。

bilingual.source: Advances in satcom have revolutionized global communication.
bilingual.target: 卫星通信的进步已经彻底改变了全球通信。

bilingual.source: Many communication systems are built on sdc technology.
bilingual.target: 许多通信系统都是基于串行数据通信技术构建的。
他们之间的通信非常频繁。

bilingual.source: The radio signal was jamming the communication.
bilingual.target: 无线电信号在干扰通信。
良好的通信能够增进理解。

bilingual.source: We use email for our daily communication.
bilingual.target: 我们通过电子邮件进行日常通信。

list.abstract: 《Communication》是来自瑞典TheCardigans（羊毛衫合唱团）乐队所演奏的一个专辑曲目。该歌曲收录于专辑《Long Gone Before Daylight 》，发行时间2003年1月1日。

COMMUNICATION（英[kəˌmjuːnɪˈkeɪʃn]，美[kəˌmjuːnɪˈkeɪʃn]），英文单词，词性为名词，译为传达；传授；传播；交流等。短语搭配有communication medium（通信媒体）。例句为“The first kind is verbal communication.（第一种是口头交流。）”。 该单词的复数形式为communications，名词类近义词为telecommunications、exchange。

yingyinNormal.en: The Capitol has always suppressed communication between the districts, but I know their system very well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国会区总是限制区与区之间的通信，但我很了解他们的系统。

yingyinNormal.en: We built our base here to be closer to their home planet, to allow instantaneous communication by Ansible with our attack fleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在这里建基地是为了靠近他们星球，以便安塞波和我们的进攻舰队建立即时通信。

yingyinNormal.en: This is unexpected, LOS. Communication lost. Standby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可是意料之外，通讯丢失，待命。

yingyinNormal.en: Aaron to Dave. All radio communication should be done using call signs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亚伦呼叫戴夫，所有通讯要用呼号进行。

yingyinNormal.en: Interagency communication at its best. I'll take care of that right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跨部门沟通很重要啊，我马上解决。

yingyinNormal.en: I intend to insist in the effort to reestablish communication with Starfleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我坚持继续尝试重建与星舰的联络系统。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, let me be clear. We're not talking about negotiation, just communication.
yingyinNormal.zh: 容我澄清一点，这并不是谈判，只是沟通。

yingyinNormal.en: All lines of communication have been compromised, both civilian and military. Shit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有通讯线路都被控制了，不论是军用还是民用。见鬼。

yingyinNormal.en: Cells group together, forming a giant web of communication which in turn forms matter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 细胞聚在一起，形成巨大的沟通网络，然后构成物质。

yingyinNormal.en: But MRI analysis has shown that MDMA actually increases communication in these regions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但核磁共振成像分析，摇头丸确实可以增强这两块区域的链接。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is? A tech bomb. Designed to block an entire military communication grid for 24 hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？一种高科技炸弹，可以阻断整个军队的通讯系统长达24小时。

yingyinNormal.en: We are telling you now, because we finally have communication with him, and a viable rescue plan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在告诉你们，是因为我们终于跟他取得联系，也有了可行的救援方案。

yingyinNormal.en: As long as there is transparency and communication. Well, that's the key to this entire enterprise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要能保证透明性并保持沟通，这正是整个项目的关键。

yingyinNormal.en: Open up a line of communication with Moscow. Tell them I'm coming to the Jordan Valley myself. Sir, I…
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟莫斯科取得联系，告诉他们我要亲自去约旦河谷。先生……

yingyinNormal.en: PTSD patients generally have a decrease in brain communication between the amygdala and the hippocampus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 普遍来说，创伤后压力症候群患者脑中杏仁核和海马回的连结较差。

yingyinNormal.en: I had an idea for a neutrino-based communication system, I presented it to them, and they were interested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个想法一种基于微中子的通讯系统，我告诉了他们，他们很感兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: 32 minutes round trip communication time. All he can do is ask, yes, no, questions. All we can do is to point the camera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 消息来回要32分钟，他只能问是不是的问题，我们只能转摄像头。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, what we have here are key elements from three of them. American kidnappers, the abduction of a child and proxy communication.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目前的事件包含三种情况的关键因素，美国绑架犯，儿童遭绑架，以及要求沟通代理人。

yingyinNormal.en: What we think we know is that there is some kind of electrochemical communication between the roots of the trees, like the synapses between neurons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们看来在树根之间，存在某种电化能量交流，就像是神经元之间的突触交流。

yingyinNormal.en: But your communication system was based on our guidance system. And sonar is based on bats. You don't see them hanging upside down in a patent attorney's office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你的通讯系统是根据我们的导向系统制造的。声呐也是根据蝙蝠制造的。你也没见他们倒挂在专利律师的办公室里啊。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 社交；社会交往；社会交际；人际交往
公司通讯；公司通信；企业传播

sense_info_list.en: the imparting or exchanging of information/news

examination_example.sentence: So when someone tries to communicate with you, just be in that <highlight>communication</highlight> wholeheartedly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当有人试图与你沟通时，就全心全意地投入到这种沟通中。

examination_example.sentence: Curriculums — from grammar school to college — should evolve to focus less on memorizing facts and more on creativity and complex <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从文法学校到大学的课程应逐渐减少对记忆事实的关注，而更多地关注创造力和复杂的沟通。

examination_example.sentence: An emerging body of research shows that positive health habits — as well as negative ones — spread through networks of friends via social <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家新兴的研究机构指出，积极健康的生活习惯和消极的习惯都通过社交在朋友圈中传播。

sense_info_list.en: means of sending or receiving information, such as telephone lines or computers

examination_example.sentence: At issue was the latest take of the Federal <highlight>Communications</highlight> Commission (FCC) on net neutrality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是联邦通信委员会（FCC）对网络中立性的最新意见。

examination_example.sentence: 10 years ago he was earning £130, 000 a year working in corporate <highlight>communications</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 10年前，他在企业通信部门工作，年薪13万英镑。

sense_info_list.en: the means of traveling or of transporting goods, such as roads or railroads
the field of study concerned with the transmission of information by various means
a letter or message containing information or news

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 传递信息；交流信息；通信；通讯；领受圣餐；沟通；有感染力；传达；传授；传播

sense_info_list.en: means of sending or receiving information, such as telephone lines or computers

examination_example.sentence: It is a powerful <highlight>communication</highlight> medium that simultaneously provides immediate, frequent, permanent, and wide-reaching information across the globe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是一种强大的通信媒介，同时在全球范围内提供即时、频繁、永久和广泛的信息。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers conclude that electronic <highlight>communication</highlight> was the only adolescent activity that increased at the same time psychological wellbeing declined.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员得出结论，电子通讯是唯一的随着青少年使用的增加，同时会伴随心理健康的下降的活动。

examination_example.sentence: There was a tendency for kids who were social in the Treal world to also use more online <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在现实世界中社交的孩子也有使用更多网络交流的倾向。

sense_info_list.en: the imparting or exchanging of information/news

examination_example.sentence: Guglielmo Marconi was arguably the first truly global figure in modern <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古列尔莫·马可尼可以说是现代通信领域第一个真正的全球人物。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps the most dramatic example of the negative consequences of poor <highlight>communication</highlight> between scientists and the public is the issue of climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家与公众之间沟通不畅所带来的负面后果中，最戏剧性的例子也许是气候变化问题了。

examination_example.sentence: Too often the blame for ineffective <highlight>communication</highlight> is placed on the side of the journalists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 往往还是将无效沟通归咎于记者。

sense_info_list.en: the field of study concerned with the transmission of information by various means
the means of traveling or of transporting goods, such as roads or railroads

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 非语言交际；非语言沟通；非语言交流

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the imparting or exchanging of information/news

examination_example.sentence: They will realise the importance of <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会意识到沟通的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to write on the topic changes in the Way of <highlight>Communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间来写交流方式中的话题变化。

examination_example.sentence: We've surveyed business <highlight>communication</highlight> consultants and etiquette (礼仪) experts to come up with the following guidelines for effectively using the alternative ways of delivering difficult messages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从商务沟通顾问和礼仪专家那进行了研究以提出以下参考，以有效使用可选的方法传递困难的消息。

sense_info_list.en: means of sending or receiving information; such as telephone lines or computers

examination_example.sentence: In a study published in Nature <highlight>Communications</highlight>, Northwestern University sociologist Dashun Wang tracked more than 1,100 scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在《自然通讯》发表的一项研究中，西北大学社会学家王大顺跟踪了1100多名科学家。

sense_info_list.en: the field of study concerned with the transmission of information by various means

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Unluckily, it was found that she had autism (自闭症) and had difficulty in social <highlight>communication</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，人们发现她患有自闭症，而且在社交方面有困难。

examination_example.sentence: Another important reason for language change is <highlight>communication</highlight> between different countries and cultures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言变化的另一个重要原因是不同国家和文化之间的交流。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Communication</highlight> is a two-way process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沟通是一个双向的过程。

sense_info_list.en: means of sending or receiving information, such as telephone lines or computers
sense_info_list.zh: 通信; 通讯; 交通联系

examination_example.sentence: 5G will make great progress in <highlight>communication</highlight> systems．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G将在通信系统方面取得巨大进展。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese companies topped the list for most 5G SEPs applications in <highlight>communication</highlight> systems by the end of April 2019.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至 2019年4月底，中国企业在通信系统方面的5G标准基本专利应用中名列前茅。

examination_example.sentence: It is 5G that is going to be a huge jump forward for <highlight>communication</highlight> systems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G对于通信系统来说将是一个巨大的飞跃。
